profile.name: Daishi Kato
profile.bio: React library author, maintaining three state management libraries, Zustand🐻, Jotai👻, Valtio🧙, and React framework, Waku⛩️.

analysis.career_trajectory: This developer has been working on various projects, including IPFS Pubsub room, Redux in Web Worker, React Suspense for Web Worker with Comlink, and Excalidraw. They have also worked on benchmarking Node.js performance and creating a tool for Working From Home. Recently, they have been contributing to Wakujs, discussing topics such as API routes, navigation APIs, and optimization.

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks deep architectural questions, Nitpicks code style, Supportive mentor.

match_profile.similar_user_traits: This developer is most similar to a maintainer or contributor of popular open-source projects.
conversation_starters: What are some common pitfalls when implementing API routes?
How do you optimize performance in web applications?
Can you share your experience with navigation APIs?
